name: Wondery
0:
”Alexa, play Morbid on Wondery”
”Alexa, play Smartless on Wondery”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to all of your favorite Wondery podcasts on Alexa without missing a beat!

Click "Enable to Use" to link your Wondery account and start streaming Wondery content on your Alexa device. If you don't have an account, you can create one here: wondery.com/login-or-signup/login

Linking your account lets Alexa access your listening history so you can start right where you left off on another device. Plus, it enables subscribers to access Wondery+ content on Alexa.

Want to use Alexa to play your favorite Wondery podcasts? Set Wondery as your default podcast player! Just ask Alexa to "set Wondery as my default podcast provider" or find Wondery under Music & Podcasts in the app Settings.
